content: What is the best and most romantic thing we have ever experienced together? What can we do to make it happen again?
What makes sex more romantic and exciting for you?
How do you feel about having 'quickie' sex?
Is there anything you always want to try, but you never talk about it?
In your opinion, do you need to make a preparations before having sex? What kind of preparations is it?
Mention our sexual moments we had that you still remember. What made that moment feel good for you?
How do you feel about our non-sexual affection, such as touching, caressing, kissing, or massaging?
What makes you feel ready for contact?
What do you need to condition your mood before having sex?
What makes you feel most loved by me?
When was the last time you cried in front of someone else? When was the last time you cried alone?
What memory do you consider most precious in your life?
If you died this afternoon, what would you regret not having told someone? Why haven't you told them yet?
Tell me about the funniest moment that ever happened to you when you were a child.
If we had to move from the city we live in now, where would you like to move? What will you miss about the city we live in now?
What do you think is the next step in our merriage?
What makes you curious lately?
When do you worry about me and why?
Is there something you keep secret from me for a long time? What is it?
What is a thing that already you start, but you never finish it? Why?
What kind of personality traits do I dislike the most in someone?
What activity have I wanted to participate in for a long time but haven't had the opportunity to do so until now?
Who is the person who gives me the best support (besides you)?
What language do I want to learn?
What a daily good habits do I want to develop?
What makes me convinced to choose you as my partner?
What is my favorite dessert?
Mention two of my nearest friends.
If I had to eat the same food every day for a week, what would it be?
What is my biggest dream that I want to achieve in my life?
